metadata.synopsis: One of the hostages thanks you for saving them from the Iron Throne. One-liner dialog.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Speak to Ogro Niggles - S_GLO_IronThrone_Group1_Prisoner3 c8b6ebf5-e505-4dbd-bd85-dbf82684cbfb - (-58; 37; 68) in the Dock warehouse after saving them.Quick setup:- Load CTY_Main_A- Use Debug Book (Ctrl + Shift + 9)- Set Quest Flags and Options -> Act3 (LOW) -> Iron Throne -> Change State -> Back At Docks -> MajoritySaved- Then talk to the NPC

1.speaker: Ogro Nettles
1.text: If only... my Gladiola... was free too.
